SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.States

Enum Class StateTUI

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<StateTUI>
it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.States.StateTUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<StateTUI>, Constable
public enum StateTUI extends Enum<StateTUI>
This enum represents the states of the TUI. Each state has a reference to a ViewState and a list of attached Renderables that will be displayed when the state is active.

    • addStartupPrompt

      Parameters:
      prompt - The prompt to add.

    • addStartupPrompt

      public void addStartupPrompt(CommandPrompt prompt)
      Adds a startup prompt to the state. The prompt will be created from the given CommandPrompt and it will not provide any answers. This is meant for the prompts that are not meant to be answered by the user.
      Parameters:
      prompt - The prompt to add.

    • triggerStartupPrompts

      public void triggerStartupPrompts()
      This methods makes all the startup prompts of the state notify their observers.

    • isStartupPrompt

      public boolean isStartupPrompt(CommandPrompt prompt)
      This method checks if the given prompt is a startup prompt of the state.
      Parameters:
      prompt - The prompt to check.
      Returns:
      True if the prompt is a startup prompt of the state, false otherwise.
